website_summaries.verdict: The Epson WorkForce DS-575W scans reasonably quickly and accurately, making it a good choice for small offices that need a document scanner with a simple feature set.
pros: Fast scanning and saving to PDF
Comes with document and business card management software
cons: Could be more accurate when scanning serif fonts

customer_reviews.title: WORKHORSE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little scanner & doesn't take up too much space on my desk. Using it to organize many years of tax & personal documents for us & mom. Yawn. Then I thought: what about organizing all my craft dies, stamps, DSP. Oh am I brilliant or what??? I am thinking now about how I can organize my craft supplies to scan & retrieve all my stuff quickly on any device thru Evernote. I have 2 extra tall bakers racks full of old files I can scan too. Oh happy day! My shredder is going to get fat eating all this paper. LOL. Oh, I almost forgot my genealogy documents, now they’ll have a home too.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo's Mum

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We are a doctors office that has been digitizing all of our paperwork with Fujitsu workhorse scanners for over 15 years. Recently one of our Fujitsu 5120C scanners finally died (after 400K) scans and I regretfully started looking for a new replacement. I came across this scanner and was impressed with its warranty, price point, and more importantly it just seems to work. Granted I have only ran a few hundred scans, but it seems to be solid and; well it works! I gave it 4 stars for now and will review again in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Renman

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd switched sooner
customer_reviews.text: I'm in an office with a LOT of personal scanners and we've always stuck with the Fujitsu FI and IX lines, that is until their software turned into a gigantic pile of garbage and they decided they didn't need to provide TWAIN or ISIS drivers. We have several of the Epson's around now and everyone loves them, I wish we had switched over to them sooner. They're less expensive, work just as well or better and have a three year warranty. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: CTS

customer_reviews.title: software updates make major issues with usage
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well at first. I bought two to replace the fijitsus. The first install went smoothly but the second I had to get a technical support person in to figure out how to get the download to stop stalling at 18%. That was costly. Then a few weeks later when I installed an update the thing quit working all together. I tried reinsatlling the software and again it stalled at 18%. I can't afford both the time or money to have technical support install a simple scanner. This has been a major PIA and I do not recommend this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not super happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this. Install initially failed but worked on second try. As soon as it finished install it wanted to update the software (even though I had just downloaded it from their site -- wouldn't you think they would have their latest software on the downloads page?). The update hung and after about 10 minutes I gave up and eventually managed to exit the update. The software without update worked ok but the scanned image had a white border around a the edge of a colored document and did not capture faint text even thought it was set to 300 dpi. Thinking about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to install and difficult TECH service!!1
customer_reviews.text: This scanner was supposed to be 'easy to install' and very compatible with my Mac. The website was very difficult to find and was difficult to find the right page for this printer. Once I got to the page and reviewed all of the documentation, I still could not get the scanner to perform. Tech Service was very uninterested in my issues and it was apparent that they know very little about Macs and how they operate. I would not purchase another Epson Scanner ever.....and will find an alternative scanner with great Mac support....
customer_reviews.author: Gary Radzat

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Macs on Mohave and High Sierra
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our medical clinics to scan medical records, in probably the highest use environment you can put them in. We have one employee who just scans, ALL day, twice a week. We have had many models of Fujitsu ScanSnap scanners, and Epson document scanners. This model is by far the most durable of the bunch, and handles large stacks of documents with ease. The software is much nicer than the Epson ES-400 or ES-500 as it's meant for business use. It's just simpler and lower profile, which is great when you're trying to pull PDFs into your main business suite. I highly recommend this scanner for heavy volume use.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome Software,  low quality scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Fujitsu ScanSnap IX500 for a few years. I needed an upgrade to a scanner with TWAIN driver. I thought this would do the job. I immediately noticed the difference. Epson is inferior to ScanSnap in every way. The only advantage may have been speed. However, the software is so bad and cumbersome and the functionality is so low that the speed a advantage won't be considered a real advantage. I decided to return this product and look at something else. The next Fujitsu with a TWAIN driver is around $700. I may have to just get it. I'm very happy with ScanSnap. I wish they had a TWAIN option.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly because of the excellent reviews and the fact it has a FULL 3 year warranty with next day replacement included. I installed the software and it pretty much works out of the box. I have not used any of the specialty software like OCR. I just want to easily scan. What I particularly love is that I am not able to scan long skinny receipts with no issues at all. I use the slow mode for feeding and it feeds flawlessly with a great image. So far this is great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: I asked my employer's tech support person for a recommendation of a moderately priced scanner, which was my only "missing link" when i moved to working from home. I ordered this based on his recommendation and have been very pleased with it. Easy to set up and has a flexible and easy to use software. I am glad I went ahead and ordered the wireless capable vs. standard model, which I believe was a $50 difference. It's convenient for me not to have it tethered to my laptop for use. Well made and compact, sits nicely atop my rolling file that holds my other supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Onasch

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner took a little bit to get setup, but now that it is we love it. This thing is a work horse. We are using it to scan multiple documents into our new digital system in the office. This scans single sided and double sided. The software let's you set presets so that it is as simple as clicking a button and you can keep on going. It does take a little knowledge of this type of equipment to get it fully functional, but overall it has been an amazing scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is my second scanner by Epson. I really like this one. I do however find the scanning software is not as user friendly as the Document Scanner used by the DS-510 scanner. But this scanner is fast and very reliable. It also is not as sensitive as the older scanner which makes scanning documents a lot easier. The DS-510 would always double feed if the paper was not perfect - do not have that problem with the DS-530.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Canania

customer_reviews.title: quality scanner, works great with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Software is a little difficult to initially setup but you just have to click around a little to figure out what settings you will need or use. Google "Canon DS-530 software download" and do the full software. This does not come with a CD, which is fine because the internet usually has more up to date software drivers anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Scanner works great. Only jam I’ve had was with crumbled paper
customer_reviews.text: Scanner works great. Only jam I’ve had was with crumbled paper. I also bought the network adaptor for scanning onto my server. This comes with no software and scans straight into a folder of your choice, then you open with adobe or any pdf edit software. Mechanically it’s excellent, but only 4 stars because they do not supply a software product to make it more manageable to scan large documents and slip them up with ease. That part is seriously lacking
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Swafford

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased one of these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the speed and quality of the scans. To get rid of all the paper receipts for tax files, I am now scanning them directly into Quicken. It is quick and easy to do and eliminates the need to file all of the paper. I highly recommend this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: go930turbo

customer_reviews.title: Broken right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the software. Malfunctioned right out of the box. Called tech support. Answered quickly. Confirmed hardware failure. 3 year warranty WITH NEXT DAY REPLACEMENT. Called on Wednesday and was told 2-3 business days for replacement. You be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: karl

customer_reviews.title: User must have admin rights
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint that I have thus far is that a user logged in from a workstation in a domain network environment must have "Admin" rights in order to scan from their workstation. I'm working with an IT person who thinks they can assign admin rights for purposes of using and accessing the scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Accountancy Lane, Ltd

customer_reviews.title: TWAIN compatibility is UNRELIABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Epson claims this is a TWAIN compatible scanner... which it is. After 10-15 scans, the driver crashes and windows is unable to locate the scanner. The fix is to turn off the scanner, and back on 20 seconds later. After further research, this is a common problem for various programs attempting to utilize the TWAIN compatibility. Ended up purchasing the Fujitsu Fi-7160. It is twice the price, but is working great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Strain

customer_reviews.title: And it's so annoying that you have to constantly watch it cause sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not suppose to scan back of blank pages but it does! It has a setting that u turn on that skips blank pages but that doesn't work out. And it's so annoying that you have to constantly watch it cause sometimes it scan both sides and then all of a sudden it only scans one side.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: This does what it does perfectly. Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Brother MFC-L8850CDW laser printer for scanning for years and thought it was good until I bought the Epson DS-575W. It's so much easier, faster, clearer. I found my Brother scanner would 50% of the time slightly skew the scan, which I can straighten out using Adobe products but it all takes time. The Epson does this automatically. I've scanned literally thousands of pages in the last week without any issue. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Keith S

customer_reviews.title: Great Update to a good line of scanners
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased several scanners over the years including the predecessor Epson models, Fujitsu ScanSnap, and Xerox DocuMate. This is an awesome scanner with super-fast feedthrough. Quick setup, and good TWAIN integration. Glad we chose this for our new primary scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Coursey

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I was hesitant to purchase for work, but glad I did. No problems with jams, connection issues, etc. It was easy to set up and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: iluvmydoxis

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I now have about 24 of these for our medical offices. They work great, are dependable and make scanning patient records into the electronic charts quick and easy. Set up is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is doing a great job. It has taken me a bit to switch from a Fujitsu to an Epson. The software is just simply different, not better or worse. I truly like that I can set how many dpis I desire, and that it can take a stack of papers, no problem. I am very, very happy with this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: KsGrl444

customer_reviews.title: Hands down... great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Makes scanning my life 100x easier! Finally clearing the clutter from my office and files... will take a while, but not nearly as long as my flatbed!
customer_reviews.author: JackieK73

customer_reviews.title: Super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scanner! Life changer! Scans all kinds of things super fast with very little jamming!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too many errors
customer_reviews.text: Constant error messages when I’m trying to scan. Every time I press the scan button it tells the the scanner is in use or unavailable. It’s taken me 2 hours to scan a small pile of documents because it requires 7-8 tries for each scan.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Scanner, Software - not so much
customer_reviews.text: The Scanner works well, is speedy. Software that's included has less functionality than expected. After the user adapts to the software it is usable.
customer_reviews.author: Palace 86

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I’m 300 dpi the speed is amazing if you want to go with higher dpi be prepared to wait but for business use does a great job
customer_reviews.author: ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scanner for the price
customer_reviews.text: The software is okay, but the scanner is great. Currently using it for scanning into an EMR, and it is quite fast with great scan quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aegis IT

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these scanners, for two different offices. They both were easy to install even though computers had different operating systems. The software seems easy to use, yet robust enough for my uses. The scanner is QUICK and works well so far. I will post any updates I may have.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie R. Juntunen

customer_reviews.title: Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s quick to setup and easy to use! Great for the office!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent....so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner for the money. Fast, relatively jam-free, and great warranty. However, I have not used the warranty yet, it's a 3 year bumper to bumper supposedly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kidd

customer_reviews.title: this is very fast and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is very fast and easy to set up. Makes my job easy. Cut my paper down.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: This machine is awesome. Takes the stress out of going (and staying) ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome. Takes the stress out of going (and staying) paperless! I've had it for a few months blow, and I love it. It just works, every time.
customer_reviews.author: Shellrae7

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This has been working flawlessly so far. Very fast scanner. Simple to use. The foot print is larger than my Cannon but way faster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a better price
customer_reviews.text: Have previously bought more expensive scanners and always disappointed by how quickly they get problems. This one was so easy to set up and has remained problem free at a fraction of the cost. I am going u to o but another one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: clwtr resident

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and realiable
customer_reviews.text: Easy install .. realizable item .. fast .. good quality
customer_reviews.author: cricket guru

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product works wonderfully. Fast scans and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark's reviews

customer_reviews.title: Epson DS-530 Doc Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desktop document scanner. It was easy to install, works perfectly, and is built we'll.
customer_reviews.author: JMAC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This Epson Scanner does everything that was described. Love it
customer_reviews.author: audre meltzer

customer_reviews.title: A winner in my book
customer_reviews.text: I love the compactness and speed with which it scans. Love that it can scan any kind of card.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works well but a word of caution- the software that goes along with the scanner froze my computer screen. After dealing with Dell computers for a week or two, we re-installed the scanner software and eliminated some extraneous downloads. Now the computer works fine and so does the scanner. But it was an enormous waste of time and I never got an explanation from Epson. Anyone else have this experience?
customer_reviews.author: af

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, more than I had hoped for. The only problem I have had, is it occasionally looses communications with the PC via USB. If I power off the Scanner and power it back on, it will re-establish and work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Parry S.

customer_reviews.title: This scanner works great. We have scanned full size pages and small ...
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works great. We have scanned full size pages and small cash register tape receipts with no problem. It is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for home office with 3 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner for home office. Pretty fast. I like the 3 year warranty a lot, gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: The OC Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this scanner. It is super fast and very easy to install. Great scanner!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josely Dimas

customer_reviews.title: The scanner is in use or unavailable. Please wait!!!
customer_reviews.text: The scanner seemed pretty good when I first installed it about a week ago but now every time I turn it on I get the message "The scanner is in use or unavailable. Please wait". To get it to work I have to uninstall and reinstall the scanner software. Very annoying and time consuming. Epson web site offers no help. Waiting for a response to my email request for support. If I don't get a satisfactory fix I will be returning the unit. I am using a recent Windows 10 PC with plenty of memory, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, imagine is fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner in July 2017. Works perfect, imagine is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best scaner
customer_reviews.text: Best of best Scaner ever before. Compact , faster , easy control
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no ethernet port and looses connection with USB cord often
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is great when it works. Half the time at the office we have to keep rebooting it to get windows to see it again. And this is with a USB connection. This thing does not have an ethernet port. So can only connect it to one computer. sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Kona kat

customer_reviews.title: This machine is fabulous. Much faster and easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is fabulous. Much faster and easier to use than I thought. Not sure what i would do about it.
customer_reviews.author: G B

customer_reviews.title: Very fast scanning.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very quick scanning in both color and black and white.
customer_reviews.author: General Pattyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The “return window” closed March 9. The machine died today, March 15. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Gtsvirxhp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scanner for over a year now and it has been amazing. It's extremely fast at a useful resolution, seldom jambs, and produces good quality scans. I would definitely recommend it. The only thing it doesn't do well is higher resolution scans of photos - which it was never intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've been very satisfied with the scanner. I bought a NEAT scanner years ago to help with organization, but it never worked up to my standards. This is simple and easy to use. It can get a little picky sometimes, but overall it has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: olaf1b

customer_reviews.title: Meets and exceeds.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works like I expected. Just been a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these to use in an office and they have been great. They are pretty easy to set up and very easy to use. They have been working great and I have not experienced any problems or even misfeeds. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: OfficeJunkie

product_meta.title: Epson DS-575W Wireless Document Scanner: 35ppm, Twain & ISIS Drivers, 3-Year Warranty with Next Business Day Replacement
product_meta.description:
Style:Wi-Fi & USB, 35ppm, 3Yr WarrantyDelivering high-quality scans at speeds up to 35 ppm/70 ipm (1), the DS-575W document scanner gives fast-paced businesses the solutions they need for more efficient document management. Wirelessly scan critical documents to smartphones, tablets or online storage accounts (2). Quickly scan stacks of pages via the 50-sheet ADF. Included TWAIN and ISIS drivers ensure easy integration with existing software, while a peak daily duty cycle up to 4,000 sheets (3) offers added dependability for busy workgroups. And, it’s all backed by an industry-leading 3-year limited warranty, including an Advance Exchange program with free Next-Business-Day shipping (4).

1. Based on letter-sized scans at 300 dpi in Black-and-White, Grayscale or Color Mode, using the USB interface.

2. Wirelessly scan to smartphones or tablets (Android/iOS devices) via the Epson DocumentScan app; wirelessly scan to the cloud, PCs or Macs with Epson Document Capture software, installed on the connected Windows PC or Mac.

3. Peak daily duty cycle is the highest recommended number of scanned sheets per day. For best results, do not exceed the peak daily duty cycle. Calculations based on a scanning speed of 35 ppm and an assumed daily use time.

4. Subject to limited warranty terms and conditions. Expedited shipping not available in all areas. Road Service orders must be in by 3 p.m. Eastern Time for Next-Business-Day delivery.

5. Carrier sheet required. (Sold separately)

6. For convenient and reasonable recycling options, visit our official site.

7. SmartWay is an innovative partnership of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.
feature_bullets: Fast scan speeds: up to 35 ppm/70 ipm (1); 1-pass duplex scanning.
Scan wirelessly: scan critical documents to your smartphone, tablet, PC or Mac.
Industry-leading service and support: 3-year limited warranty with Advance Exchange program, including free Next-Business-Day shipping (4).
Seamless compatibility: includes TWAIN and ISIS drivers for easy integration with existing software.
Easily scan stacks of documents: 50-page Auto Document Feeder (ADF). Operating temperature - 5 to 35 degree celsius

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars183 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
